: : Darkangel/DeathStar : :

Darkangel: My old friend, DeathStar. Looks like he wasted no time getting here.

Outside DeathStar flies over the base.

DeathStar: DeathStar, TRANSFORM!

After changing to robot mode, DeathStar lands on his feet, outside the base. He opens a comm channel to Darkangel.

DeathStar: You called for backup?

Darkangel: Good to hear from you, buddy. I'll be right out. C'mon, Deadplague.

Darkangel heads out to meet them. On his way he opens a comm to Tyrael.

Darkangel: Commander, I have contacted Cybertron. They will be sending reinforcements. Two have already arrived.

Darkangel arrives outside and sees DeathStar.

Darkangel: It's good to see...

DeathStar: You end that with "sir."

Darkangel: You're not my air combat instructor anymore.

DeathStar: You could always learn more.

Darkangel: Haha, whatever you say, oldman.


Nic <Proudwing500k@...> wrote:
In the Tripred base, Dreadplague got something on the scanners.

Dread: Hey, Angel, looks like the cavalry's coming in! Who was it you 
contacted already?

<DIV><STRONG>: : Darkangel/DeathStar : :</STRONG></DIV>
<P><STRONG>Darkangel: </STRONG>My old friend, DeathStar. Looks like he wasted no time getting here.</P>
<P>Outside DeathStar flies over the base.</P>
<P><STRONG>DeathStar: </STRONG>DeathStar, TRANSFORM!</P>
<P>After changing to robot mode, DeathStar lands on his feet, outside the base. He opens a comm channel to Darkangel.</P>
<P><STRONG>DeathStar: </STRONG>You called for backup?</P>
<P><STRONG>Darkangel: </STRONG>Good to hear from you, buddy. I'll be right out. C'mon, Deadplague.</P>
<P>Darkangel heads out to meet them. On his way he opens a comm to Tyrael.</P>
<P><STRONG>Darkangel: </STRONG>Commander, I have contacted Cybertron. They will be sending reinforcements. Two have already arrived.</P>
<P>Darkangel arrives outside and sees DeathStar.</P>
<P><STRONG>Darkangel: </STRONG>It's good to see...</P>
<P><STRONG>DeathStar: </STRONG>You end that with "sir."</P>
<P><STRONG>Darkangel: </STRONG>You're not my air combat instructor anymore.</P>
<P><STRONG>DeathStar: </STRONG>You could always learn more.</P>
<P><STRONG>Darkangel: </STRONG>Haha, whatever you say, oldman.</P>
